definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: I. [[קטר]] (√ of foll.; cf. As. ḳutru (with [[ת]]) smoke; Talm. Targum [[קִיטְרָא]], [[קוּטְרָא]] (thick) smoke; Ar. qatara smoke (said of fire); usu. exhale odour (esp. of roast meat); As. ḳutrinnu, incense-offering; Sab. [[מקטר]] censer CIS:iv. Nos.26, 1. 6; 30, 1.4. Eth. qt4re:: incense; Egypt. ḳatalqa Bondi:74 ff. kataruti WMM:As. u. Eur. 97 = [[קְטׂרֶת]], [[קְטָרוֹת]]; NH [[[קָטַר]]] smoke (said of incense)).
